tool_description: Introducing the pinnacle of online betting experiences: our state-of-the-art Betting API, designed to revolutionize the way you engage with sports betting. Crafted with precision and powered by cutting-edge technology, our platform mirrors the renowned features and functionalities of industry titan Betfair, ensuring an unparalleled betting journey for enthusiasts worldwide.
name: Premium Sports APi
title: Premium Sports APi

api_list.name: GetMarketOdds
api_list.description: Here you can getmarketOdds of that match

required_parameters.name: market_id
required_parameters.description: Use market_ids to get markets odds

api_list.name: GetMarketlist
api_list.description: Here you will get the list of market ids of particular match of Series

required_parameters.name: eventid
required_parameters.description: Use eventid to get all marketIds

api_list.name: listBookmakerMarketRunner

required_parameters.name: MarketID
required_parameters.description: Use Bm market if to get Bm Runners

api_list.name: listBookmakerMarketOdds

required_parameters.name: MarketID
required_parameters.description: Use Bm market id to get Bm Odds

api_list.name: listBookmakerMarket

required_parameters.name: EventID
required_parameters.description: Use event id to get Bm markets

api_list.name: GetSession
api_list.description: Use Evetn id to get Session/Fancy of that match
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://premium-sports-api.p.rapidapi.com/v2/GetSession"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premium-sports-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetMarketRunner
api_list.description: Here you will get market Runners of specific match

required_parameters.name: market_id
required_parameters.description: Use Market id to get Runners

api_list.name: getEvents
api_list.description: Here you will get the list of Events by series id.

required_parameters.name: sportid
required_parameters.description: Use sport id of that particular Sport

required_parameters.name: sid
required_parameters.description: Use Series Id which you get from getCompetiion.

api_list.name: allSportsID
api_list.description: Here you will get the id's of all the sports which you can use to get data of matches.

api_list.name: getCompetitions
api_list.description: Here you will get the list of series by sports id.

required_parameters.name: id
